Sample Design Stratification Variable (Prior to 2011: _STSTR is a five digit number that combines the values for
Stratum weight (Number of records in a stratum (NRECSTR) divided by the number of records selected (NRECSEL).)
Raw weighting factor (Number of adults in the household (NUMADULT) divided by the imputed number of
Design weight (Stratum weight (_STRWT) multiplied by the raw weighting factor (_RAW).)
Raw weighting factor used in raking (Number of adults in the household (NUMADULT, maximum of 5) divided by
Design weight used in raking (Stratum weight (_STRWT) multiplied by the raw weighting factor (_RAWRAKE).)
Geographic region within a state, imputed from CTYCODE, _IMPCTY, or _GEOSTR
